properties.name: Hawaiian Tropical Dry Forests
properties.description: Endangered dry forest ecosystems found on the leeward sides of Hawaiian islands, characterized by native species like wiliwili and mamane trees.
properties.climate: Tropical dry climate with distinct wet and dry seasons

properties.name: Hawaiian Tropical Rainforests
properties.description: Lush rainforests on the windward sides of Hawaiian islands, home to endemic species like the Hawaiian tree ferns and native birds.
properties.climate: Tropical rainforest climate with high precipitation year-round

properties.name: Alaska Boreal Interior
properties.description: Vast boreal forest and tundra ecosystem covering interior Alaska, characterized by spruce forests, permafrost, and extreme seasonal temperature variations.
properties.climate: Subarctic continental climate with extreme winter temperatures

properties.name: Alaskan Arctic Tundra
properties.description: Treeless Arctic plains with permafrost, supporting caribou migrations and diverse Arctic wildlife during brief summer seasons.
properties.climate: Arctic climate with permafrost and polar night/day cycles

properties.name: Puerto Rico Moist Forests
properties.description: Tropical moist forests of Puerto Rico, including El Yunque rainforest, supporting high levels of endemism and biodiversity.
properties.climate: Tropical climate with consistent temperatures and seasonal rainfall

properties.name: Texas Blackland Prairies
properties.description: Fertile prairie ecosystem characterized by deep, dark clay soils supporting diverse grassland communities and agricultural lands.
properties.climate: Humid subtropical climate with hot summers and mild winters

properties.name: Southern Rocky Mountain Steppe
properties.description: High elevation grasslands and shrublands of the southern Rocky Mountains, featuring sagebrush communities and montane meadows.
properties.climate: Alpine and subalpine climate with cold winters and short growing seasons

properties.name: Mojave Desert
properties.description: High desert ecosystem known for Joshua trees and unique desert communities, transitional between Great Basin and Sonoran deserts.
properties.climate: Hot desert climate with extreme temperature variations and low precipitation

properties.name: Great Basin Shrub Steppe
properties.description: Cold desert ecosystem dominated by sagebrush and bunchgrasses, located in the rain shadow of the Sierra Nevada and Cascade mountains.
properties.climate: Cold desert climate with hot summers and cold winters

properties.name: Northern Mixed Grasslands
properties.description: Diverse grassland ecosystem spanning the northern Great Plains, supporting both tallgrass and shortgrass prairie communities.
properties.climate: Continental climate with cold winters and warm summers

properties.name: Southeastern Mixed Forests
properties.description: Diverse temperate forests of the southeastern United States, featuring oak-hickory-pine communities and high biodiversity.
properties.climate: Humid subtropical climate with hot summers and mild winters

properties.name: Northern California Coastal Forests
properties.description: Temperate coniferous forests along the northern California coast, featuring coast redwoods and Douglas fir in fog-influenced climates.
properties.climate: Mediterranean climate with marine influence and summer fog

properties.name: Central Forest-Grasslands Transition
properties.description: Ecotone between eastern forests and western grasslands, creating diverse oak savannas and woodland-prairie mosaics.

properties.name: Chihuahuan Desert
properties.description: Large desert ecosystem spanning the southwestern United States and northern Mexico, characterized by diverse succulent communities.
properties.climate: Hot desert climate with summer monsoons

properties.name: Central Canadian Shield Forests
properties.description: Boreal forest ecosystem on the ancient Canadian Shield, featuring coniferous forests, countless lakes, and pristine wilderness.
properties.climate: Boreal climate with long, cold winters and short, warm summers
